data.text:
Hmm Hmm H-Hmm♪ 
It's time for a bath!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm Hmm H-Hmm♪ 
󠁿It's time for a bath!

data.text: Have a second?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Have a second?

data.text:
Wah! Ayabe-san! 
Do you need something?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Wah! Ayabe-san! 
󠁿Do you need something?

data.text:
Your hairband… You left it on my bed. 
Stop leaving your things in weird places.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Your hairband… You left it on my bed. 
󠁿Stop leaving your things in weird places.

data.text:
Eh!? I dropped it? I didn't even notice. But 
thanks for bringing it to me♪ It would've been 
a problem if I didn't have it after my bath!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Eh!? I dropped it? I didn't even notice. But 
󠁿thanks for bringing it to me♪ It would've been 
󠁿a problem if I didn't have it after my bath!

data.text:
Ah, that's right! You never come here, so 
why don't we take a bath together, Ayabe-san?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, that's right! You never come here, so 
󠁿why don't we take a bath together, Ayabe-san?

data.text:
I know you prefer showers, but your Selection Race is coming up 
soon. Soaking in a bath and relaxing would be good for you♪
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿I know you prefer showers, but your Selection Race is coming up 
󠁿soon. Soaking in a bath and relaxing would be good for you♪

data.text: No…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿No…

data.text: Aghh… Hmm, guess that didn't work…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Aghh… Hmm, guess that didn't work…

data.text: Haa… Jeez, what's with her…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Haa… Jeez, what's with her…

data.text: But…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿But…

data.text: If you were still here… would you…?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿If you were still here… would you…?

data.text: Would you… treat me like she does?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Would you… treat me like she does?

data.text:
"You see those two stars? I heard that they'll be together 
forever since someone pleaded with God for it to happen."
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
󠁿"You see those two stars? I heard that they'll be together 
󠁿forever since someone pleaded with God for it to happen."

data.text:
"Hehe… One day, when I become a star… 
I hope we'll be together forever too."
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
󠁿"Hehe… One day, when I become a star… 
󠁿I hope we'll be together forever too."

data.text:
Sometimes I feel like someone is with me. I've had this feeling 
since before I can remember. Someone so close that I could almost 
touch them, yet so far that I can't even see them.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Sometimes I feel like someone is with me. I've had this feeling 
󠁿since before I can remember. Someone so close that I could almost 
󠁿touch them, yet so far that I can't even see them.

data.text:
As I stare up at that red star, the feeling only grows stronger. 
So ever since I was a child, I would often speak with that 
someone under the starry sky.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿As I stare up at that red star, the feeling only grows stronger. 
󠁿So ever since I was a child, I would often speak with that 
󠁿someone under the starry sky.

data.text:
Whenever my mother would see me doing that… 
She would laugh uncomfortably.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿Whenever my mother would see me doing that… 
󠁿She would laugh uncomfortably.

data.text: Ngh… Nghhh…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Ngh… Nghhh…

data.text: You're going to end up oversleeping…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿You're going to end up oversleeping…

data.text:
But for some reason I can't sleep! 
Ayabe-san, you have nights like that too, right?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿But for some reason I can't sleep! 
󠁿Ayabe-san, you have nights like that too, right?

data.text: I do, but they're probably different than yours.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I do, but they're probably different than yours.

data.text:
Is that so? Well hey… Since we both 
can't sleep, why don't we have a little chat?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Is that so? Well hey… Since we both 
󠁿can't sleep, why don't we have a little chat?

data.text: No. Go to sleep.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿No. Go to sleep.

data.text: Ehh!? But I'm so lonely, Ayabe-san!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Ehh!? But I'm so lonely, Ayabe-san!

data.text: Shut up.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Shut up.

data.text:
No no no no! If you won't talk to me, 
then I'll just have to sneak into bed with you.
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿No no no no! If you won't talk to me, 
󠁿then I'll just have to sneak into bed with you.

data.text: You better not do that…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿You better not do that…

data.text: What will we… even talk about?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿What will we… even talk about?

data.text: Yay♪ Well, we should talk about something simple…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Yay♪ Well, we should talk about something simple…

data.text:
Ah, how about the first time you ran? 
I'd love to hear about your memories♪
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, how about the first time you ran? 
󠁿I'd love to hear about your memories♪

data.text: The first time…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿The first time…

data.text:
Yes, yes! You were quite a spectacular racer! So please enter 
your daughter, Admire Vega-chan, into the "Pony Cup!"
data.name: Race Organiser
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, yes! You were quite a spectacular racer! So please enter 
󠁿your daughter, Admire Vega-chan, into the "Pony Cup!"

data.text:
So that's what you want… 
Hey, Ayabe-chan… What do you think abou―
data.name: Ayabe's Mom
data.processed:
󠁿So that's what you want… 
󠁿Hey, Ayabe-chan… What do you think abou―

data.text: I wanna enter!!
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: 󠁿I wanna enter!!

data.text: I really, really wanna enter!! I… want to run!!
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: 󠁿I really, really wanna enter!! I… want to run!!

data.text:
I still remember… I've always been a silent person, but I 
responded in such an excited way… as if I was possessed by 
someone else. My mother seemed surprised, and frightened.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿I still remember… I've always been a silent person, but I 
󠁿responded in such an excited way… as if I was possessed by 
󠁿someone else. My mother seemed surprised, and frightened.

data.text: The "Pony Cup!" Hehe, so that was your first race!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿The "Pony Cup!" Hehe, so that was your first race!

data.text: How was it when you finally got to race? How did it feel?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿How was it when you finally got to race? How did it feel?

data.text: What I felt…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿What I felt…

data.text:
The smell of the turf… made my heart race. The incredible 
sensation of moving forward, cutting through the wind.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿The smell of the turf… made my heart race. The incredible 
󠁿sensation of moving forward, cutting through the wind.

data.text:
My heart was beating like an alarm bell. The scenery 
flew behind me beautifully, almost like a meteor…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿My heart was beating like an alarm bell. The scenery 
󠁿flew behind me beautifully, almost like a meteor…

data.text: Ayabe-san…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Ayabe-san…

data.text: What…?
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿What…?

data.text: Eh! Ah, I'm sorry! Well… Umm…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Eh! Ah, I'm sorry! Well… Umm…

data.text: "Possessed by someone else…?"
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿"Possessed by someone else…?"

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…?

data.text: Yay, Yaay! Mom, I did it! I won! Ehe! Ehehe…
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: 󠁿Yay, Yaay! Mom, I did it! I won! Ehe! Ehehe…

data.text:
Hic… H-Huh? Wh-Why am I… 
Are these… tears…? Why… won't they stop…!?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
󠁿Hic… H-Huh? Wh-Why am I… 
󠁿Are these… tears…? Why… won't they stop…!?

data.text:
Why…? I… I umm… I really liked racing. I… was having 
so much fun, it's almost like I wasn't me anymore…?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
󠁿Why…? I… I umm… I really liked racing. I… was having 
󠁿so much fun, it's almost like I wasn't me anymore…?

data.text:
But still… I just feel so lonely… and so sad… 
Mommy… Why… Why is this happening to me…?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
󠁿But still… I just feel so lonely… and so sad… 
󠁿Mommy… Why… Why is this happening to me…?

data.text: Ayabe-chan…
data.name: Ayabe's Mom
data.processed: 󠁿Ayabe-chan…

data.text:
This conversation is over… The dorm 
leader will be making her rounds soon anyways.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
󠁿This conversation is over… The dorm 
󠁿leader will be making her rounds soon anyways.

data.text: Ah, but, Ayabe-san…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, but, Ayabe-san…

data.text: I said it's over. Now go to sleep…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿I said it's over. Now go to sleep…

data.text: Okay…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Okay…

data.text: Sometime after the "Pony Cup" my mother finally told me.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: 󠁿Sometime after the "Pony Cup" my mother finally told me.

data.text: Honey, you actually have a… little sister.
data.name: Ayabe's Mom
data.processed: 󠁿Honey, you actually have a… little sister.

data.text: She was… your twin. But… she was stillborn.
data.name: Ayabe's Mom
data.processed: 󠁿She was… your twin. But… she was stillborn.
